overview: MIGRANTS, a short film by Paul Chadeisson, is the first short film presented by Oats Studios in a new playlist that will become a curated collection of Oats' favorite short films from their favorite artists.  Many years ago, humanity started the process of terraforming Mars. We follow the thoughts and prayers of one of the "cleaners" who work on this titanic project.
tagline: OATS STUDIOS PRESENTS - a Short Film by Paul Chadeisson
title: MIGRANTS
